name: Qatar Flying Club
about: Qatar Flying Club, established in 2008, is a premier flight training institution in Doha, Qatar. Our program is designed to teach not only the technical aspects of flying but also to instill discipline, responsibility, and a strong safety consciousness. We cater to a diverse range of students, from novice flyers to those seeking advanced certifications. Our experienced instructors and well-maintained aircraft ensure a safe and professional learning environment. We offer a comprehensive curriculum that includes ground school and practical flight training, preparing students for various licensing requirements. With a focus on community and passion for aviation, we welcome individuals to join us in pursuing their flying dreams. At Qatar Flying Club, we are dedicated to nurturing the next generation of pilots with excellence and integrity.
services:
["Discovery flights
Aircraft rental
Aircraft basic handling
Aviation Fuel (Avgas & Mogas)
Flight support (State of Qatar)
Aircraft hangars
Flight planning to and from Qatar
Flight training (coming soon)"]
